longDescription: Tech Expert is a smart Telegram bot that acts as a personal deal-hunter for tech enthusiasts. It actively monitors major e-commerce sites like Amazon and Flipkart during big sales events like Black Friday and Prime Day. Using web scraping techniques, the bot identifies significant discounts on gadgets and electronics. When a great deal is found, it immediately sends a notification to the user with a direct link to the product, helping them make timely and informed purchasing decisions.
